title: SCP-055

params.defense: also varies but most likely none idk up to the host

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, the player with this role gets to choose exactly what this role does. It must be approved by the Host.
- All investigative abilities used on this role fail, as the investigator fails to recall what they learned about the target.

desc:
Post 3573
*055 is a "self-keeping secret" or "anti-meme". Information about SCP-055's physical appearance as well as its nature, behavior, and origins is self-classifying.*
